hopobject.name: login
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; en-US; rv:1.9.0.5) Gecko/2008120121 Firefox/3.0.5
hopobject.body:
BeagleBoard.org login page

Before you can edit any pages, you must login.

Login using prompt in the footer ( )

If the bottom of the page shows text with your OpenID identity and "Logout", then you are logged-in. If the bottom of the page shows a box with the OpenID logo ( ), then you must type your OpenID identity URL into this box and click the "Login" button to proceed.

For more information, please visit the registration page.
